name: The Banner Saga 3
description: Banner Saga 3 is the epic conclusion to a sweeping viking saga six years in the making. This strategic RPG, acclaimed for its strong story and compelling characters has won over 20 awards and been nominated for 4 BAFTA awards.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 10 GB available space
